relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y on Earth Community Podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.

working in artist relations and production.
where she developed a network of relationships with talent and industry executives.

also served as operations manager for the Mill Valley Film Festival.

which hosts outdoor adventure and environmental films at their annual Memorial Day event.
